subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The United States Open champion Justin Rose shot a four-under-par 67 for a two-shot lead over Jason Dufner in the PGA Grand Slam of Golf in Southampton, Bermuda.
snippet: The United States Open champion Justin Rose shot a four-under-par 67 for a two-shot lead over Jason Dufner in the PGA Grand Slam of Golf in Southampton, Bermuda.
